fullplot: In 1977, Roman Polanski was arrested in Los Angeles on charges he gave drugs and had sex with a 13-year-old girl he was photographing for Vogue. Eleven months later, having pled guilty to one count, he fled to Europe before sentencing. This film examines that year-long period, using archival footage of the media frenzy and of Polanski's life before the charges, clips from his films, and contemporary interviews with many of the principles - attorneys, the victim, and Polanski's friends and associates. Polanski remains enigmatic, but portraits emerge of the machinations of justice and of a judge more interested in his image than his word or the law.
plot: Examines the public scandal and private tragedy which led to legendary filmmaker Roman Polanski's sudden flight from the United States.
title: Roman Polanski: Wanted and Desired

tomatoes.consensus: A courtroom drama and an exploration of celebrity and responsibility.
